## Read data

```{r}
library(learningtower)
library(tidyverse)
data(student)
```

## Australia

```{r}
student %>% 
  filter(country == "AUS") %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(math = weighted.mean(math, stu_wgt, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
    geom_line(aes(x=year, y=math)) +
    ylim(c(0,1000))
```

# All countries

```{r}
student %>% 
  group_by(year, country) %>%
  summarise(math = weighted.mean(math, stu_wgt, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot() + 
    geom_line(aes(x=year, y=math, group=country)) +
    ylim(c(250,800))
library(plotly)
ggplotly()
```
